thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 12 of 465
thread.title: KAREN HANDER
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by KAREN HANDER

author: KAREN HANDER
title: KAREN HANDER
text: I have never received bad service. I have talked to customer service a couple of times, I found a young lady there that has always helped me and made everything flow perfectly. Her name is Sadie and I can't tell you how much I value her professionalism and ability to handle what I need. Your delivery drivers have always been as equally as good. Thank you for making our experience this good.
